title: 1. The Reveal

itunes:title: 1. The Reveal

itunes:summary: Smug and Holmes bring next generation conservative talk to the next level with RUTHLESS. There is no shelter for anyone as the duo provide a lighter analysis of the news (and fake news) of the day.
